subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wilson founded the Bills as an original member of the A.F.L. in 1960 and took them to four Super Bowls in the 1990s as the team’s only owner.
snippet: Mr. Wilson founded the Bills as an original member of the A.F.L. in 1960 and took them to four Super Bowls in the 1990s as the team’s only owner.
